review:
I recommend doctor, but the fact that, you won't feel to visit again due to the rude behaviour of supporting staffs in billing and appointment section. Staff are not responsible. 
Asked for the test results through mail and given the mail id also. Even after 2 days, I didn't receive any. 
Don't loose money unnecessarily.
Very patient and helpful doctor. Is observable , ************* *** caring. I will recommend this doctor.

*** ***** ****** * **** **** *** **** *****  Forat of all the appointment was at 4:30 pm and the consultation was done at 5:15 pm. Secondly, she is very very rude with the patient. Doesn't listen to what patient has to say about their problems instead keeps blabbering her own stuff. Didn't check even for 30 seconds and immediately started writing a prescription without even explaining what medicine is to be taken when and for what. I would strongly suggest not to give to her if you genuinely want your problem to be cured.

We went for the consultation,she started shouting at us for not having the previous treatment documents(to some extent it is acceptable),then suggested to do a test and come.back next day with all the documents..when we went on the other day with the test reports and all previous treatment documents ,  she refused to meet us.. instead one of her assistant met us and did the consultation which was obviously not satisfactory,when we asked her assistant if we can meet.doctor Philomena ..she said no...this is not acceptable.. we are booking the appointment to meet her and she is not meeting with the patients ,not satisfied with the consultation.

My wife had visited the hospital and it was gynecology related. ****** *** **** ** **********. I can definitely recommend the doctor to my family or friends. I am satisfied with the treatment given by the doctor. Scanning was done. There was no waiting time in the hospital.

I have consulted the doctor for a gynecology issue. ************ *** ** ** *** ****** *** ** *** * ***** ********* ** ***** * *** ******* ****** ***** * ***** I am 50 percent happy with consultation. ******* **** ********** ** *** ****** *** ** *** *** ********** There was more waiting time in the hospital, I waited for 2 hours. Doctor was decent but didn't interact much.
It is good to have your case in some experienced hand. She listens patiently and provides a best option accordingly.

We visited to her for breast pain sharp stabbing inflammation in breast and also high prolactin level. She is very rude doctor in prescription she mentioned only Restyl tablet. *** ***** **** ********* ********* *** **** **********
